title: Project Structure
description: Understanding the recommended project structure for our framework.
author: Charlie Davis

blocks.content: Learn about the recommended folder and file organization for projects using our framework.

project-root/
  ├── src/
  │   ├── components/
  │   ├── pages/
  │   └── utils/
  ├── public/
  ├── tests/
  └── package.json
